heres the link to my previous post for those who wanted to go back and read it  original post summary for those of you who didnt see my original post heres brief summary in my previous post shared some difficult suspicions about my wife who recently became increasingly close to yearold boy she coaches she started making strange comments about his looks athletic abilities and personal qualities that went beyond usual enthusiasm for coaching meanwhile shes become much more secretive with phone and is often late home from practice without clear explanations these changes have left me wondering if theres something more happening between them but dont have solid proof and dont want to jump to conclusions without evidence late update first off want to thank everyone for the comments advice and support my original post unfortunately my original post was initially taken down and received threeday temporary ban from the subreddit thankfully the post was eventually restored after my ban ended since wasnt able to share updates during that time ive decided to create new post with all the updates so far structured chronologically to keep everything organized sorry to keep everyone waitingthis is why im only updating now and the last five days have also been whirlwind post update took some of your advice and reached out to lawyerwell sort of an old friend from high school whos now successful family lawyer happens to be visiting this week while family law isnt exactly what need id rather speak to someone trust before hiring lawyer and potentially escalating things out of control im meeting him for coffee tomorrow and will update you afterward im hoping he can give me some solid legal advice without things getting too intense obviously dont want to be arrested or anything drastic like that but also dont know what to do next right now im not even angryjust overwhelmed and in shock its hard to process that someone ive been so close to over the last two years might not be who thought and could have been hiding something awful this whole time post update the last five days have been absolute hell the title is bit of giveaway but pretty much everyone who commented was right and my own suspicions have been confirmed after talking to my friend the lawyer we agreed that should confront with my concerns suggest looking through phone together just to put some of my suspicions to rest realise how risky this was but we really didnt have lot of choice considering there was no clear proof that anything weird had been going he suggested that we meet somewhere quiet but still in public setting in case she decided to freak out and do something irrational decided to take our local park where sat down park bench well away from any crowds of people when we sat down together told how serious of situation we could be in and that she must be completely honest with me and that want to be side but the way she had been acting had led to some serious suspicions explained to that didnt want to break the trust between us so had decided against looking through phone despite how tempted was when told the concerns she immediately got defensive and started denying everything she called me paranoid asshole for even suggesting that she would be in relationship with minor she said the fact that would even question something like this means theres probably something wrong with me and that must be the one hiding something honestly the way she reacted just confirmed to me that there was something that she hadnt been telling me this entire time and that without cooperation the safest bet was probably just to leave suggested that we look through phone together just to provide me with closure and even if there was nothing to hide it would mean lot to me that she would just humour me and that it might even be fun to look through together and laugh at how ridiculous was being she screamed at me for trying to invade privacy and that had massively originally posted this few days ago but was removed because it was structured incorrectly so am reposting it with some edits made hopefully this doesnt get taken down tried to get the original post reinstated but that didnt work so have decided to repost for those who were looking for an update to the previous posts link to original post  link to first update  summary of situation in my first post shared that had been increasingly concerned about my wifes fixation yearold boy she coaches over the past months shes brought him up constantly talking about his potential and struggles almost daily at first assumed it was part of dedication to volunteer work but focus him seemed to cross professional boundaries especially as she became defensive and secretive when asked about it many suggested look deeper and after further observation noticed she was glued to phone at odd hours sometimes smiling or acting distant thanks to comments thank you to everyone who reached out in my previous posts your advice and support have helped me more than can express took lot of your suggestions to heart and its been complicated journey heres whats happened since then post update did what many people suggested and contacted our local police although this would be the preferred option our current financial positional and my current salary doesnt allow me to hire private investigator she is also the main earner in the relationship about of our shared income not only can not afford to hire pi but there is also the issue that we have shared bank account any purchases am aware that its always smart to have our own individual bank accounts alongside shared one but we have been so close as trusting with each other that we havent really seen the need for this and having joint account has never really been an issue as job is an accountant she is mainly in charge of managing our banking and any large purchases have to go through both of us just by the way the account is set up this means it would be practically impossible to hire private investigator without finding out after our last conversation she has moved back after staying with friend and we are living in the same home it is very awkward and have been trying to avoid wherever possible whilst doing my best not to let that am trying to dig further it was about day after my last post that decided to contact the police and after pretty long conversation explaining the situation they told me that there was no legal grounds for them take action without any concrete evidence or clear signs of suspicious activity they advised me to keep an eye out and call them immediately if anything new came up appreciated their time but honestly their advice didnt give me clear path forward post update so there has been major development to the situation am feeling load of complicated emotions right now and writing this has been very tricky since the police couldnt help took advice from many of you and contacted our shared mobile provider after some back and fourth they sent over out call and sms records from the past six months these records only cover standard messages and calls spent hours combing through these records trying to find anything unusual and eventually found what was looking for lot of messages and calls with specific unknown number after digging into it realized that this number wasnt the kids it belonged to his dad suddenly things clicked and at the same time was thrown into whirlwind of emotions grief anger disbelief in weird way was also somewhat relieved dont know for sure but what think has been going this entire time is my wife has been having an affair with this kids dad hence recent obsession knowing full well that she couldnt openly talk about relationship with this dad it appears she has been using his son as an outlet to talk about him in our daily lives without arising too much suspicion in some strange way even feel hint of relief if im right at least she wasnt involved with minor this still feels like betrayal but one thats more bearable than the alternative looking through the messages can now see that she is obsessed with this man and it looks like they are in love am distraught thabu uzun zamandır devam uzun zamandır güvendiğim sırdaşlık ettiğim kişi yalan söylüyordu hissettiklerimi kelimelerle ifade edemiyorum onunla çocuk arasında uygunsuz this is going to be very long one apologize in advance my wife and got married very recently this year in gorgeous ceremony surrounded by our friends and family we were together for years prior this last year has been monumentally stressful for the two of us both workwise and with the wedding planning however the day couldnt have been more perfect and it was undoubtedly the absolute best day of our lives making all of the trouble and stress more than worth it make very good money and provide for the both of us while my wife takes care of financesbills plans our trips and generally keeps me uplifted when im stressed with work adore my wife shes beautiful smart extremely well read and has always shared my sense of humor when we met couldnt believe that there was someone as wonderfully goofy and weird as was and knew very early that she was the one for me we made it through the pandemic together through distance at times and never thought that anything could sway my feelings for we booked an expensive honeymoon in tropical location scheduled few weeks after the wedding shed been there before and told me she had always wanted to go back paid while she as per usual organized the trip the first few days were amazing were not super active our vacations and were just happy to drink go to the beach for the whole day and out to nice dinners in the evening the second hotel we stayed at is where things took turn while out my wife and started chatting to few other couples at beachside barrestaurant were both very social so we like asking other couples about themselves sharing funny comparisons and including each other in the laughs she was getting little tipsy but nothing too bad or out of the ordinary at some point she began to start slipping into drunk territory and started ordering us more food and suggesting she take it easy which she obliged despite this she later kept ordering more drinks asked to please take it easy because know pacing at this stage she got quite agitated and stated that this was honeymoon too and she wanted to relax while talking some more she got noticeably more drunk pretty fast was talking to the couple my right when heard my wife tell the girl next to that she had one that got away who she wished she hadnt let go and that she settled for me my face my stomach my heart everything dropped cant imagine what must have looked like in that moment but the people she was talking to got very quiet and awkward the couple next to me tried changing the subject still my wife went she gestured toward me and began to discuss that wasnt type at all and went to describe something entirely different we had both made jokes in the past about not being each others initial type but that since meeting each other we were both the type we both never knew we wanted it seems this wasnt true end she patted my head condescendingly and said unfortunately this was the best could do but life goes she wasnt laughing she was completely deadpan was absolutely crushed this didnt seem at all like the person had been with over the last years tried to get to put drink down let me pay the check and leave when she outright snapped the waitress had refused when she asked for another drink and she stormed off to the bathroom at this stage the people she was talking to had migrated tables and the couple next to me were trying to reassure me despite the bomb that had clearly gone off went to go check after few minutes this turned to more minutes after which the waiting staff had to go in and retrieve she had been getting sick in the bathroom she didnt say word to me when she got out and just grabbed stuff in the interim the other couple had picked up our check which was incredibly embarrassed about but grateful for the parted ways saying happy honeymoon in awkward wincing smiles left with feeling utterly dumbstruck embarrassed concerned and above all just heartbroken she spent the entire walk back to the hotel saying that she knew was embarrassed of behaviour adding you know what dont care youre an embarrassment most of the time she went to point out that she that was not funny or charismatic as she had said in the past but clown laughing stock and that our friends only put up with me out of niceties she said that they all just saw me as complete joke and that was just too stupid to notice this was all being screamed at me in front of as many people as you can imagine popular destination spot would have walking around in the main town all while was trying to keep from stumbling out onto the street had turned from embarrassed and upset to completely numb felt as though my marriage had detonated then and there im ashamed to say this but in that moment imagined leaving as soon as got back home and the ensuing embarrassment of having to explain to friends and family that my marriage had not even lasted season without crumbling we were getting into semi crowded elevator when she squirmed out and bolted off immediately ran back down stories and spent the next minutes trying to locate the hotel premise finally we got back to the room and she fell straight to sleep the bed rolled onto side tucked in and got water we were going to our rd stop at resort the following morning so just stayed up and packed to say felt empty inside is complete understatement she woke up about hours later asking what had happened why looked so upset asked if she was actually serious if the most devastating part of our relationship of any relationship had ever been in had not just happened for she seemed anxious as if it were less than half coming back to so told everything she had done as calmly as could told how much she had hurt and embarrassed me with what she had said she was hysterical she started screaming into the pillows trying to hurt herself screaming that she had ruined our honeymoon and our marriage begging me not to leave telling me she didnt mean it she was still fairly drunk told to just go back to sleep that needed to go for walk and have some time to think she refused to give me it she grabbed my arm while asked to let go scratching me while told to just let me have space screaming all the while stopped and just got into bed and told could not talk to we both went to sleep but she woke me multiple times telling me that we needed to talk through this and that owed that much just told that couldnt was shattered told didnt even know if could finish the rest of the honeymoon and that didnt know if could go to the final resort we were staying at woke the next morning she had cancelled our day resort stay that we were due to be at in hours of which received no refund she cried she apologized she begged for me to hear out but there was literally nothing that could fix what she had said and how she talked to me after in that moment she told me that it wasnt that she remembered none of it and that she couldnt even begin to think of why she had said and done those things that it wasnt how she felt at all and that was the best thing that had ever happened to that had to believe after everything we had been through asking why couldnt just trust after all of this time together this is getting very long so to put the rest of the trip briefly she used savings to pay for very expensive resort for us that day apologizing for cancelling the other one without asking first she wanted to save the trip for the rest of the trip she was remorseful she was kind she was sweet she was the person that had fallen in love with she seemed just as shattered and upset as was tried to make the most of the rest of our stay but it was obvious that was still heartbroken despite trying to keep it together she cried the plane home and she cried most of the day we got back fast forward couple of very awkward sad and tense days she comes to me and lays out all of the changes she was going to make she has always done the laundry but didnt really do lot of the cleaning or cooking in recent months she would often get agitated when would finish work and start doing it she promised to do all or at least most of the household stuff to take the pressure off of me she started dressing up doing makeup more often she even cooked me fancy dinner and decorated to show how much she appreciated me and the life had given words not mine she told me that she had only said those things because she was insecure about not working about herself in our friend group and how she had felt that our mutual friends liked me more than dont believe that last part to be true in the slightest more than half of them were actually friends before they were mine asked about the one that got away as difficult as it was and she said that she didnt know why she said that but she didnt feel that way she said that was type that was the only one for and that she would spend as long as it took to make it up to me we see lot of relationship posts reuploaded to tiktok and one thing absolutely can not stand is that the couples can not seem to fathom the concept of actually communicating to each other in situations like this and thats what we did we communicated we talked openly and honestly told firmly and candidly about all of the changes needed asked about what needed to change what could have made so full of contempt for me in that moment our honeymoon and what we could both do to avoid it things started to pick up over the next few days and it seemed like things were going to be ok there were some lingering things of course wasnt initiating intimacy just couldnt felt like complete loser felt completely undesirable questioning how anyone could see anything in me if this is how she felt she tried multiple occasions but just asked for time to recover she gave me that space and reassured me that she would wait as long as it took for me to feel up to it again we both always had high sex drive and that was now completely shot finally over time we were intimate again she cooked cleaned did sweet things for me acted like she did when we first met it really did feel like this whole nightmare might have been net positive like it had kicked some things that were off in our relationship back into place like it was the wakeup call we needed still had intrusive thoughts but we communicated and she would compliment and reassure me she would constantly ask if how she was acting and the things she was doing for me were noticeable told that they were and that appreciated them and tried to be more aware of any flaws myself might have in my day to day its been some weeks since then and things have started to slip back the nice dinners stopped almost immediately as did the nice gestures shes started to become irritable with me with small things unrelated to me shes stopped doing household things consistently and is again irritable when ask if she can help with them while im working dont work the longest hours earth by any means but my work weeks are to sometimes hours ill find downstairs playing video games or watching streams and asking to help out is leading to strained discussions at times she doesnt not do housework at all but its absolutely noticeably less already she had started therapy through betterhelp have no experience with that app and dont know if it is reputable but that stopped after about weeks we have long discussions and things get better momentarily but they keep resetting and feel like im in sate of dj vu with everything again previously stated that hate that couples cant just talk to each other in these kind of posts but weve been talking shell turn around and still do sweet things but just cant bring myself to look past what happened sometimes and its still eating at me my confidence is completely fine some days and others it is just the floor still love but can not say with any confidence that feel in love with anymore and dont know what to do never thought would see myself this end of one of these posts shes talked to mother about it and can not bring myself to say anything to my parents or friends im so embarrassed and havent been able to confide in anyone about this aside from thank you all for taking the time to read this any advice movement forward would be so appreciated have wonderful day all of you tldr my wife drunkenly said she settled for me and is still holding candle for someone else our honeymoon then she said was joke edit oh my goodness thank you all for your messages no matter what your opinions were appreciate all of them and appreciate you all giving your time and advice only just work up so sorry for not responding sooner really wasnt expecting this turnout in the comments being able to get the story off of my chest outside of talking to is in itself some form of relief see lot of people writing that my wife married me for the money really should have added that when we got engaged we did not have much money at all sorry for not including it initially wrote this at around am my time and the grammatical errors reflect that we got engaged in the middle of the pandemic work had dried up in my field and we were both banking my plan to pay off she always said she believed could be successful but was by no means close to being financially sound when she said yes to marrying me however that said take from that what you will im trying my best to read through all of the messages ill be honest lot are difficult to process see acknowledge and appreciate the ones telling me to look out for my best interests but also the ones telling me to actually ask my wife about aspirations or goals which surely can not be sitting aroundhousehold tasks in the past its been touchy andor difficult to get to pursue the field of degree its creative and daunting and she has often gotten defensive and dismissive of my help in the past this morning asked to lay out realistic and specific plan to get back into working with the goal of working towards the career she actually wants have never been to therapy but im going to look into one one sessions and go from there no matter what outcome after reading this clearly need to work me whatever that might entail im going away trip with some guy friends for couple of days and while they are our mutual friends im going to try and open up to them as nonbiased as can thank you all for sharing your own past experiences so candidly with me and for the dms also know thbu sonraki adımlar bebek adımları görünüyor tarafınızdan okunması sinir bozucu olabilir ikimiz dindarız boşanma seçenek elimden update at bottom this happened days ago and im still bit shook up about the whole situation and not sure what caused it so for context f have brother m for the sake of this post will call him mike mike and have never really gotten along growing up and he had gone to prison for years when was and just got out last year it was probably the longest me and him ever went without arguing about something sunday my brother came over to my grandmothers house had been living here with my husband and children to help take care of my grandma since shes dealing with alzheimers and was in the kitchen making pizza since had just woken up my husband woke up about an hour or so before did and had already gone upstairs into the kitchen and spoke with my father and mother information didnt know until after everything had happened while was in the kitchen cutting the pizza my brother called me from the living room told my son yo to go see what he wanted and to get me if it was important my son went into the living room to ask my brother what he needed and came to tell me that he just needed to talk to me went into the living room and was met immediately with yelling and screaming had only been awake for minutes by this point so was super confused and asked him what he was talking about because had no knowledge about any previous conversations that had taken place in the house he was yelling about my husband not helping my father out with yard work my husband had injured his shoulder at work couple days prior asked mike what he was talking about because didnt know anything and he just got into my face and started screaming that needed to get out of the house because all was doing was taking advantage of our family left the living room and went into the family room where my children and months were and told my oldest to go downstairs into the basement when turned to get my yo daughter my brother had followed me into the family room and was only inches away from my face and was screaming was put into ptsd attack because of how he was acting had been diagnosed with ptsd years prior due to an abusive relationship was in pushed him to get him away from me so could get my daughter and month old son to take them away from the screaming as soon as turned to start walking towards my baby who had started crying due to the noise he grabbed the back of my neck and started punching me until fell down to my knees ran to get my husband and told him what was happening my husband was outside the phone with his father because we were supposed to go over to his house to pick up something we left over there my brother followed me outside and started screaming again and things kept escalating he threatened to kill my husband and when heard that ran inside and grabbed my phone which was the table next to the playpen had my baby laying in immediately called the police and took my other children downstairs in the basement we have tv and ps so my husband put spiderman game for my yo to play while talked to the police after the police talked to everyone and got statements my brother was attested since he left giant bruise my neck where he had hit me my dad thinks should drop the charges because my brother was out of prison in god behavior and could be sent back for the rest of his sentence which would be year term told my husband that will not drop the charges against him since it wasnt the first time hes ever hit me and refuse to let him keep doing it my entire family is really torn about the whole situation and my uncle who was there when it happened bailed my brother out of jail am still messed up about it since it all happened so quickly and didnt even know why my brother was upset in the first place my dad has been acting really cold to me since wont drop the charges and im starting to feel like may be going bit too far by pressing charges dont know what to do my dad has talked to me about me moving out of my grandmothers house since it happened and dont know what to do should go ahead with pressing charges update thank all of you for the advice talked with my husband about everything and he agreed that we should get protection order as well to answer few questions saw in the comments my grandmother owns house but will is set up as trust so once she passes the house will be sold and the money split evenly between kids my dad uncle and aunt told my parents was concerned about the condition of my grandmother because my uncles health had been declining and he can no longer cook for which is why we moved in to help in the first place since moved in had been the primary cook in the house making sure my grandmother has healthy meals we were planning buying house next summer but since everything has happened we have moved up our move out date and will be buying houbu yıl noelden kocam büyükannemi kontrol hemşirenin parasını ödeyeceğiz sağlığı konusunda endişeliyim olmadığımda düzgün bakmak başka kimsenin çaba please read this before you comment am f english teacher who teaches at an alternative school for obviously reasons will be keeping the students name my name as well as my schools name out of this post if you arent aware of what an alternative school is its basically school that kids come to when they dont do well at other schools this can be for multitude of reasons such as drugs grades bullying or just overall not being able to function in normal school setting before she joined our school all of the staff who would be teaching had meeting with our principal and the principal of previous high school he let us know why she was removed from other high school long story short she got removed because she put one of peers into the hospital fast forward to school starting dont have this girl in my class until the second semester of the year which started in january when see automatically knew it was she just had completely different energy than the other students who come to our school she was confident peers respected she was quiet although many people tried to talk to she would kind of give them look nod at what they were saying and just go back to work very quickly found out that this girl was borderline genius she was one of the smartest students ive ever taught and should know this considering usually teach seniors in their english class this girl was only sophomore and in the same class at this point had kind of forgotten about the meeting that we had had in regards to past highschool and when someone had brought it up to me just couldnt believe that this was the same girl and it was surely misunderstanding however this week everything changed she came into class and you could immediately tell something was different all of my students were scared and im not talking they were nervous or waiting for something to happen mean everyone came in they put their heads down and were quiet which is highly unusual she came in about minutes late told she was minutes late and asked where she was she looked me dead in the face scoffed at me and then went and sat down as teacher who is responsible for disciplining students obviously walked over to and asked thought they would none of it was good hes filled with fluids the ammonia build up in his body was what was causing his confusion but great news he just became aware again and was able to sit down and talk to him he wanted me to get in his bed with him and snuggle him but asked the doctor and its special bed that keeps his weight and everything and with all the cords from ivs and whatnot couldnt but rubbed his back and head until he fell asleep again his son and his mom and cousin are coming to see him tomorrow from the next state over they said can continue to stay with him and its better stay anyways due to patient safety which im happy about they have him some special medicine that is tricking his body into filtering out the ammonia through his feces instead of his kidneys hes used the bathroom himself times today which was hard to see because its just not him but am glad its made him better these last nights have felt like weeks to me im exhausted but think can finally sleep tonight in the chair next to him knowing hes coming back he still has long road ahead of him so there will be more updates as the doctors fill me in more and more about his situation thank you for your support everyone truly appreciate it update they can not do the stomach tap to get the fluid out until they thicken his blood they are getting him started vitamin k he also woke up with his legs and feet swollen physical therapy came and walked with him and they said he shouldnt need physical therapy which is good he finally yelled at me today to go home apparently he was asking me for something and was checked out im so exhausted and know hes right so im trying to find cheap taxi home or see if the hospital can provide transport for me plan going home to sleep for little bit then coming back later ended up crying from frustration im not frustrated with him am frustrated with myself that am not able to stay awake even walked around the hospital and ate breakfast trying to stay awake and ended up falling asleep standing up im anxious about going home and not being able to keep close eye him but know dont really have choice im gon na get some rest so can be back and awake for him hoping for the best more updates soon update continued was able to get some sleep must admit feel so tired still but much better now that im not sleeping standing up lol am packing some things to go back to the hospital his mom called me and she was very sweet telling me to take care of myself and that she loves and thanks me for helping son was also able to get my medication antibiotics for my infection from cervical surgery had recently ill update once again once get to the hospital and learn what missed out the doctor said its best to try and get his stomach to go down naturally rather than try to tap it since it may cause permanent damage they are giving him plasma infused with vitamin k lets hope it goes down im going to be making gofundme for him tonight he needs to be in an actual home we also met with someone today to try and get him medicade im feeling much better since got some rest today really appreciate the help and encouragement from everyone know its silly since its the internet but its really kept me going for himself and me thank you guys more updates coming as soon as know more update he had his stomach drained today liters thats lot of fluid hes started getting really irritated and unfortunately taking it out me know he doesnt mean it and hes apologized to me like he didnt like his dinner today so went to the cafeteria and got him cheeseburger and got the wrong kind of cheese it and he had fit he then apologized and ate it and asked me to get him some pie such silly man his legs and feet are extremely swollen he cried today because hes scared about the swelling and getting drained am glad im here to be his rock am drained myself but im still staying strong for him was able to make and launch the gofundme last night no donations so far but lets hope it gets noticed we are going to try and get him disability which will help me be able to pay rent and everything else until hes able to get back to being himself hopefully can raise enough to be able to get an actual home apartment or house my infection came back from my surgery because wasnt able to finish my antibiotics and my doctor told me have to go back to the er today will go tomorrow or the next day know have to be healthy in order to be able to help him so wont push it off too much longer will be coming out with more updates soon hopefully he can get the swelling down and we can just go home together soon miss laying in bed with him update its been awhile since ive posted and im not sure if anyone checks back anymore but ill catch you guys up his tests kept getting better and he was doing better he had one episode where he was seizing and bleeding but everything came back normal ct scan blood sugar and vitals he was walking better and his swollen legs and feet started going down after his seizure incident the staff wouldnt let him walk outside which really pissed him off he got to come home with me yesterday one of the staff helped us get taxi hes home now and as suspected we are having trouble getting his meds while we wait for his disability to kick in we spoke to the staff about it and there isnt much more they can do except wait like us hes links to all previous posts are at the bottom recap of the situation leading to this update became suspicious of my wife after she started making strange comments about yearold boy she coaches in soccer when confronted she became defensive and lashed out after going through phone discovered that shes likely been having an affair with the boys father initially felt sense of relief that it wasnt predatory situation but was also overwhelmed with grief and betrayal realizing that my wife had been unfaithful update first off just want to thank you all for your support and patience through this difficult time unfortunately my most recent update was removed so reposted it but that was then locked so havent been able to reply to any comments or make any edits to the actual post now before the update also need to admit something that lied about in my last update said got records from our shared phone provider but the truth is actually went through phone was nervous about admitting this here and worried about potential consequences but in retrospect feel had good enough reason to check and the phone was purchased using our shared bank account which could give me valid claim for accessing it if it counts for anything did try to contact our shared service provider but they told me they dont give out any specific personal information this includes messages to anyone but the police for security and confidentiality reasons when looking through messages with hot soccer dad the same name kept coming up and it became clear that this was the kid the messages made it quite obvious who it was as they were often using the kid as an excuse to stay in contact the conversations were overly flirty and it was quite obvious that something was going between the two of them top of this it looks like they have met up several times for coffee after practice dont know where the kid goes in that time as there is still no mention of his mother and still dont know much about the kids family situation with all that said im relieved to say that things are finally moving forward decided to meet with divorce attorney who has been fantastic and am in the process of finalising everything im now set up in temporary apartment with separate bank account it was surprisingly easy to open and regret not doing it earlier the freedom its given me has been massive weight off my shoulders im not nave anymore and have no intention of dragging this out but know things may still get complicated though after lot of stress and uncertainty im finally starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel and its relief to think shell soon be out of my life the last real piece of bad news in this update family especially sister is fully aware of the situation but has chosen to side with ive never been the biggest fan of sister to be completely honest but never to this extent ive been receiving aggressive messages from sister calling me selfish and threatening to ensure my wife gets everything theyve even implied that they use their familys financial resources to back legally as theyre well off and have offered to cover costs to add to this there are some legal loopholes regarding out shared assets including the house which could mean have lot more to lose in this than expected this has been humbling and in some ways eyeopening experience always assumed infidelity or these kinds of situations would be easy to spot never expected to be blindsided by my own partner someone loved and trusted completely realize now that betrayal doesnt fit into near categories or follow obvious patterns although this situation didnt turn out to be the predatory relationship feared it shown me that anyone male or female can be vulnerable to this kind of manipulation with the court date likely coming up in the next couple months and the divorce process underway it feels like im nearing the end of this exhausting chapter im incredibly grateful for all the support and insight ive received here its been strange few weeks but im determined to close this chapter and start fresh ill keep sharing updates as things progress though dont foresee too many more developments thank you again for being there know cant respond to everyone but your encouragement has meant lot and given me the courage to keep fighting oh and one more thing forgot to add reconnected with my brother and shared everything about whats been happening thankfully he was really glad reached out and hes actually planning to come visit at the end of the year im really looking forward to it ive missed him lot since we last saw each other during the difficult time of our mothers passing since this is the radvice subreddit still need to ask for advice so can anyone give me any advice how to get through tricky divorce has anyone else been through anything similarto this what is the best way to move with my life link to original post  link to update and

around k people there arent any tourist places here came solely to be with if she lived in city that would otherwise visit would be fine paying to stay it was pretty clear was only coming here to see reconcile my emotions edit one of the comments mentioned this and think should point this out am pescatarian and husband eat everything so shes been only putting red meats into the food though know she loves seafood and she does have quite large selection of frozen seafood that she hasnt touched since got here edit someone mentioned should say in my post that ive been getting groceries and shes either way this is lot of comments and ill be offline sorting out my next moves for everyone reading there are lot more details in my comments so feel free to hunt those down if you can for more this post told felt excluded and lot of words and actions made me feel like my friendship needs werent being met told was fine paying and cooking for my own food but wouldve loved it if she was more back with another update for those who asked cant believe its been over months now we applied for kinship and have had the provisional approval and the home inspection and some interviews weve got couple more things to dostill ongoing and then we should be good we got our first payment which has been so good and really made me feel much more optimistic about everything bc we will be able to actually do something other than just survive the case worker pretty much told me they dont want to have to find placements for this many kids so us keeping them is their much preferred option which is reassuring my mum hasnt contacted me for while we thought she might show up easter bc holidays are usually time to cry about how much she misses our dad and she usually prefers to ruin everyones day with that but she didnt come thank god our nan is still at our aunties bc she cant stand to be around us apparently bc me trying to feed them good food and not let year old disappear for hours bicycles with kids years old than is just me thinking im better than my nan lot of people said to trying cosleep with yr old so have started doing that its helping bit and she actually will lay down so thats win but she still cries lot and tries to get up she also does death grip me so have kind of accepted that have to go to bed when she does its not the worst thing ever bc have been looking things up and reading online whilst lay with when she eventually calms down ive ordered melatonin to try share room with yr old and she doesnt want yr old in there but its kind of tough cant do anything about it until we can move house which isnt going to be soon its not the most peaceful night with in there bc she kicks me and wakes up at random times trying to chat or crying but we are getting some sleep she slept in my single bed with me from months old until she was like clearly knew nothing about safe sleep but my mum had sold the crib to try to annoy my dad so she actually had no where else to sleep and havent told that bc dont want to tell mum didnt care that she didnt have bed but she seems to remember bc she said we used to have sleepovers in your bed lot didnt we also got yr old earplugs and told she can sleep in yr olds bed in the other room if she prefers do my best to try to soothe yr old in general she had one of crying breakdowns last week and said she didnt feel safe or happy then she said she wishes was real mummy told am real mummy bc ive looked after whole life and wont ever leave she seems bit happier since then im going to get photo of us for to have in little purse she carries everywhere shes pretty sentimental so she will like that yesterday she asked me if me and our brother are married lol obviously said no and she said just feel like you are my mum and dad hope thats good thing even if it is little weird she is definitely bonding with him too she always wants me to carry around and when say no bc im busy he offers to do it and she lets him now she used to ignore him seeing snuggle into his neck and actually relax is the cutest thing makes my heart happy bc remember wishing had dad who would hold me and im so glad she is getting all the love me and my brother have had few disagreements over discipline he is pretty strict and usually thats good thing bc they need it tbh but sometimes find it bit much biggest disagreement was when he smacked yr old and lost my shit we grew up with lot lot worse and ngl have smacked them before but dont want to be doing that anymore bro thinks theres nothing wrong with smack the bum would just rather we dont go there he said he wont do it again and dont think he will he wasnt angry when he did it so im not really concerned about it and he apologised to yr old were just still trying to figure out discipline our dad used an electric cord as whip so one smack the bum is practically gentle parenting to us have read enough to know we dont want to be doing any physical disciplining though worst thing ive had to do is give the youngest suppositories my sister gave me money to take them to the gp bc was worried about them and couldnt find any for free and didnt want to wait for kinship turns out they are both malnourished underweight and constipated af and theyve missed some vaccines for the constipation we tried medicine and more fibre and more water but no bueno so it had to be the suppositories bc the doctor said it was verging severe tried to explain it to them and make the whole thing easy but it turned into quite the drama yr old was easier but still took me while yr old was impossible and everyone got too stressed day so we left it and she was still not complying day so my brother had to get involved and pretty much had to hold down bc called the doctor and f am currently weeks pregnant with girl although she was an unexpected surprise my partner m and are ecstatic and look forward to parenthood lost my mama when was young so we are planning to name this baby after lt most of my family and friends have been really support of me and my pregnancy as enter this new stage of life however my cousin and my aunt who acted or at least tried to as mother figure and female role model to me and my sister since my mothers passing have been causing issues my cousin f has been struggling with infertility for about years now and has witnessed its ups and downs me my sister and all of our family members have been trying our best to be sensitive to circumstances and have been supporting through the process she had miscarriage years ago and was diagnosed with having diminished ovarian reserve years ago meaning that egg quantity and quality are considerably lower compared to other women age she immediately started the ivf process and after rounds she miraculously got pregnant late she had complications with the pregnancy including preeclampsia and went into labor at weeks in the summer unfortunately baby girl was very weak at birth and died hours after she was born everything my cousin has struggled with over the past years hit hard and she suffered from an extreme depression for months afterwards she has refused to seek therapy which we believe would be beneficial to state apart from couple of appointments initially because she says she feels misunderstood and anger towards the professionals trying to make feel better she still desperately wants baby but refuses to seek treatments again due to trauma and lack of hope hope this context helps yall understand the situation im going to talk about and if applicable provide any advice to help us guide our cousin to some sense of recovery after finding out about my pregnancy announced it to my family and friends in february made sure to texttell my cousin individually before she heard about my pregnancy elsewhere so she can initially process the news herself privately according to my other cousins and aunt she did not take the news well and went into rage when saw afterwards she was more reserved and rather cold week later she said she wanted hang out and have private onetoone chat which agreed to we talked over ice cream and went back to and husbands home she showed me baby stuff that had been untouched for months since loss she told me she saw so much of the baby she lost last year in my own baby and how god brought my baby into our lives for special reason she asked me if id be willing to allow to adopt this baby into home to be raised by and husband refused she asked why for lack of better and stronger response in the moment said that both me and my partner wanted to care for our child and that was sorry for loss and that was sure miracle would come way she blew up at me and called me bunch of names knew she was struggled and very traumatized so tried not to let words of the moment get to me she said how me and my partner didnt deserve our baby because we werent married yet we are engaged and planning the wedding for next year and how she and husband could provide our baby with better and more stable life as more deserving and respectable parents she then kicked me out my aunt later texted and called me trying to reason with me my refusal she said should give my baby to daughter she emphasized that would still get to see as she would be within the family and that could have more kids later as was still young she said
